title: Topic 003 Question 005
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that uses an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant named fabrikam.com as an identity provider. The integrated system region name is region1, and the external domain name is fabrikam.com.
The integrated system has the following domains enabled for multitenancy:
You need to disable multitenancy for contoso.com.
How should you complete the PowerShell script? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
